text.div:
ColorectalCancerTumourLocation

This code indicates the location of the colorectal tumour.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    32713005Caecum
    9040008Ascending colon
    48338005Hepatic flexure
    485005Transverse colon
    72592005Splenic flexure
    32622004Descending colon
    60184004Sigmoid colon
    49832006Rectosigmoid junction
    34402009Rectum
